data.actual_result: it does transfer into your dms textbox.
data.expected_result: the Emoji in the Channel textbox shouldn't get transferred to your dms textbox.
data.short_description: If you select an emoji from the emoji picker in a server then switch to dm history the emote that was in the server Channel textbox transfers to the dm textbox
data.steps_to_repro: go to a channel.-open the emoji picker.-click on an emoji.-after clicking on it don't send it let it be in the textbox.-click on the friends icon above the servers list or whatever that's called it should redirect you to your latest dms with a user.
